bibl.title: Imitative Amphoras in the Greek World.
bibl.note: Paper presented at a workshop on imitations in antiquity held in Winnipeg, Canada, in November 2007. - Introduction. - City-specific amphoras. - Shared regional styles. - Genres of imitative amphoras. - Interpreting imitation in amphoras. - Conclusion.

bibl.title: Münstersche [puis: Marburger] Beiträge zur antiken Handelsgeschichte

bibl.seg: Mark L. Lawall, Imitative Amphoras in the Greek World.

Paper presented at a workshop on imitations in antiquity held in Winnipeg, Canada, in November 2007. - Introduction. - City-specific amphoras. - Shared regional styles. - Genres of imitative amphoras. - Interpreting imitation in amphoras. - Conclusion.
